channel.title: What is it other players need to download to play my server?
channel.description:
Warning:I am very new to coding and such. File names confuse me easily if not very specific.
Problem: I have my server and everything online, but my friends can't seem to connect. I know I have everything on my side in order, but what is it that my friends would need to download in order to play on my server (online)? I know they need Hamachi, so don't add that.

item.title: What is it other players need to download to play my server?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

with hamachi u need to be able to ping eachother if it doesnt ping u still need the port open for it to ping so…

Read full topic
item.source: What is it other players need to download to play my server?

item.title: What is it other players need to download to play my server?
item.dc:creator: @Thunderheart221 Thunderheart221
item.description:
@Thunderheart221 wrote:

I’ll deal with portforwarding after I check out some changes I made to my client, and I need online friends to check it out. I already have the Hamachi stuff set up, all I need is to know what it is my friends need to download…

Read full topic
item.source: What is it other players need to download to play my server?

item.title: What is it other players need to download to play my server?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

theres an automatic port forwarder on forums and if that dont work for you use the utorrent method dont use hamachi it does blow and it is not worth it on top of that make sure you changed your clients ip to whatever ip u will host it on rather you have noip adress or what

Read full topic
